sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> is like an <radical>escalator</radical> you use to <kanji>suck</kanji> and <kanji>inhale</kanji> things into your body.
meaningInfo: If you're ever having trouble remembering how to suck or inhale, just picture an actual escalator that leads into your mouth. That'll definitely help.
readingMnemonic: Use this mouth ability to <kanji>suck</kanji> <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (<ja>きゅう</ja>) into your mouth. Cucumbers are shaped like cylinders so you can suck them into your mouth like this. Just as nature intended.
readingInfo: You can inhale a cucumber too, I suppose, but don't tell anyone I told you to.
